Scott Disick fumes at "fake" Kourtney Kardashian after she refuses to invite ex to family events

Things get tense between the former couple in a teaser for an upcoming episode of KUWTK

,Tensions rise, between Scott Disick and the Kardashians...

Since splitting in the summer of 2015 Scott Disick and Kourtney Kardashian have enjoyed a relatively friendly relationship for the sake of their kids.

However, in an upcoming episode of Keeping Up With The Kardashians, things get tense between the former couple when Scott is left out of a family event.

The teaser shows Kourtney telling her ex that she's been too soft on him before.

View 9 Images Scott Disick blasts "fake" Kourtney (Image: YouTube/E! Entertainment)

View 9 Images Kourt tells Scott he's no longer welcome at family events (Image: YouTube/E! Entertainment)

"You think you can hurt me and still get invited to everything," the 38-year-old says.

A visibly angry Scott then fires back: "It's funny how fake you really are."

View 9 Images While Scott is now with Sofia Richie, Kourtney has moved on with Younes Bendjima (Image: E!)

View 9 Images It's not the first time Scott's fumed at his ex on an episode of KUWTK (Image: E!)

Scott's frosty response comes after he screamed down the phone at the mum-of-three when she told him that she'd been pictured in public with her new man, Younes Bendjima.

"Last night I went to dinner with a guy and was photographed and I just felt like I should give Scott a heads up out of respect, even though he hasn't done the same to me in the past," Kourtney tells the camera in an episode of KUWTK that aired early last month.

"But the photos never ended up coming out in the end so it was pretty much all for nothing."

Defensive Kourtney sets Kris straight on Scott Disick

It then cuts to Kourtney talking to Scott on the phone as she explains that she was on a date.

But Scott, clearly not happy, starts screaming expletives down the phone at the mum-of-three.

A shocked Khloe, who is with Kourtney at the time, says: "He's screaming at the top of his lungs. Is he drunk right now?"

View 9 Images The pair said they always remained civil for the sake of the kids (Image: Instagram / kourtneykardash)

Kourtney, as calm as ever, replies: "He sounds like it."

"That is belligerent Scott," Khloe adds.

Scott Disick Freaks Out over ,Kourtney Kardashian's lunch with other man,

‌



9 View 9 Images Scott and Sofia enjoy a break in Miami (Image: REX/Shutterstock) 9 View 9 Images The pair were also recently snapped enjoying a romantic break in Venice (Image: Flynet Pictures)

Kourtney then tells Khloe what she said to Scott: "I go, ‘You wouldn't even give me a warning. I'm just giving you a heads up, should I not do that?' And I'm like, ‘Next time I won't,' and he's like, ‘There's gonna be a next time?!'"

‌



Elsewhere in the episode, Kourtney tells mum Kris Jenner that Scott needs to "get a f*king life and leave me alone."

"It's just like I can't even live my life. I can't even go anywhere. He needs to get a f-king life and leave me alone.

9 View 9 Images Kourtney has introduced her new man to the family (Image: Splash News) 9 View 9 Images Kourtney brought boyfriend Younes Bendjima along to Kendall's recent birthday party (Image: Splash News)

"All he does is try to make everybody else feel bad for him and try to make me look like the bad guy in this situation when clearly I'm not from 10 years of this going on," she says.

An angry Kourtney continues: "I have to handle it when he's out photographed with a different hooker every day."

Watch Keeping Up With The Kardashians every Sunday on E! at 9pm
